languages.text: {n}Дознаватель касается своей шеи в том же месте, где у пленника расположен свежий шрам.{/n} "Уверен, это — след заражения".
{n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель касается своей шеи в том же месте, где у пленника расположен свежий шрам.{/n} "Уверен, это — след заражения".

{n}The Interrogator touches the prisoner's neck next to the fresh scar. He mouths,{/n} "Infected."

languages.text: {n}El interrogador se toca su propio cuello en el mismo sitio donde el prisionero tiene la cicatriz reciente.{/n} «Un síntoma de infección, estoy seguro».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador se toca su propio cuello en el mismo sitio donde el prisionero tiene la cicatriz reciente.{/n} «Un síntoma de infección, estoy seguro».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターが自身の首の、囚人のできたばかりの傷があったその場所触れる。{/n}「感染の兆候です。間違いありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターが自身の首の、囚人のできたばかりの傷があったその場所触れる。{/n}「感染の兆候です。間違いありません」

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着犯人脖子上的新伤，摸着自己脖子上同样的地方。{/n}“这是感染的迹象，我很确定。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着犯人脖子上的新伤，摸着自己脖子上同样的地方。{/n}“这是感染的迹象，我很确定。”

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator fasst sich an die Stelle an seinem Nacken, an dem der Gefangene seine frische Narbe hat.{/n} "Ein Zeichen der Infektion, ganz sicher."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator fasst sich an die Stelle an seinem Nacken, an dem der Gefangene seine frische Narbe hat.{/n} "Ein Zeichen der Infektion, ganz sicher."

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur touche son propre cou à l'endroit correspondant à la cicatrice encore fraîche du prisonnier.{/n} « Un signe d'infection, à n'en pas douter. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur touche son propre cou à l'endroit correspondant à la cicatrice encore fraîche du prisonnier.{/n} « Un signe d'infection, à n'en pas douter. »

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, kendi boynuna dokunuyor. Dokunduğu nokta, mahkûmun boynunda yeni yara açılmış noktayla aynı.{/n} "Bir enfeksiyon izi. Bundan eminim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches his own neck in the same spot where the prisoner has his fresh scar.{/n} "A sign of infection, I'm sure of it."
